name: Lords of Xulima - An Epic Story of Gods and Humans
blurb: A 2D isometric, turn-based Role-Playing Game with the depth and challenge of old-school classics and a modern, intuitive interface.

rewards.reward: No Reward

THANKS!
==============================
●  Receive an email from the Numantian Games team with a nice, high resolution wallpaper to thank you for your contribution.

● Your name will be included on www.lordsofxulima.com as game supporter.

UPGRADE! "The Talisman of Golot" \r\n=============================For people who supported us before and wish to receive this in-game artifact, please select this perk and use the same e-mail you used for IndieGoGo.

EARLY BIRD FOR FIRST BACKERS !
==============================
● Digital copy of Lords of Xulima (also with a Steam Key if the game is launched on Steam) 

● High resolution digital World Map with all of the regions of Xulima.
LORDS OF XULIMA + WORLD MAP\r\n==============================\r\nDigital copy of Lords of Xulima (also with a Steam Key) \u25cf High resolution digital World Map with all of the regions of Xulima.

LORDS OF XULIMA + WORLD MAP + THE TALISMAN OF GOLOT
==============================
● Digital copy of Lords of Xulima (also with a Steam Key if the game is launched on Steam) 

● High resolution digital World Map with all of the regions of Xulima.

● The Talisman of Golot is an exclusive Kickstarter gift. You'll begin your adventure wearing the Talisman of Golot, a divine artifact that can help you when you need it the most. Do you need food? Money? A new weapon? Want to improve an ability? The Talisman can help you, but be careful to only use it when you need it, the Talisman can only be used a limited number of times.

+ DIGITAL GAME GUIDE
=============================
(All previous rewards included)

● Digital Game Guide:
A Game Guide with all of the quests and secrets you’ll need to enjoy your time in Xulima. The guide is filled with information regarding the game’s rules and mechanics.

SPECIAL LIMITED BESTIARY & MYTHOLOGY EDITION!\r\n=============================\r\nBecause we love our awesome book Bestiary & Mythology of Xulima, here you have a special offer that includes the digital version together with the game guide with all the secrets, the digital HD map of Xulima and the digital version of Lords of Xulima.

+ DIGITAL BESTIARY & MYTHOLOGY
============================= 
(All previous rewards included)

●  Digital Book: Bestiary and Mythology of Xulima:
With more than 150 pages, this book contains descriptions and statistics for all the monsters in the game. Also included is a detailed telling of the cosmology and mythology of Xulima.

+BRONZE MEDAL IN CREDITS + WALLPAPERS
============================= 
(All previous rewards included)

● Exclusive high resolution wall papers.

● Bronze Medal in the Credits!

+ BETA PLAYER EDITION! =============================\r\n(All previous rewards included) \u25cf Includes access to the BETA version and access to the BETA forums where you will be able to share your opinions and feedback.

+ BOXED EDITION OF LORDS OF XULIMA!
============================= 
(All previous rewards included)

● Lords of Xulima boxed edition with printed manual. Also included is a beautiful printed World Map with all of the regions of Xulima.

● Free Shipping !!

+ PRINTED GAME GUIDE
============================= 
(All previous rewards included)

● Printed Game Guide:
A physical copy of the game guide with all the quests and secrets you’ll need to enjoy your time in Xulima. The guide is filled with information regarding the game’s rules and mechanics.

● Free Shipping !!

+ BOOK: BESTIARY & MYTHOLOGY
============================= 
(All previous rewards included)

● A hardcover copy of the book "Bestiary &amp; Mythology of Xulima"
This book, with more than 150 pages, contains descriptions and statistics for all the monsters in the game. Also included is a detailed telling of the cosmology and mythology of Xulima.

● Free Shipping !!

+ BETA KEY & SILVER MEDAL IN CREDITS
============================= 
(All previous rewards included)

● Beta Access Key:
Play the beta before anyone else and be a part of the creative process with your feedback. Also, you will have access to the development & testing forum.

● Silver Medal in Credits!

+ SPECIAL SIGNED EDITION!\r\n=============================\r\nThe Lord's of Xulima director, and RPG Guru, Jes\u00fas Arribas will be signing and personally inscribing the Bestiary Book. He will even write a unique dedication, just for you! NOTE: Anyone who pledges to the other rewards above $120 will also get their Bestiary and Mythology book signed!

+ NAME AN NPC
============================= 
(All previous rewards included)

● Name an NPC:
Choose the name of an NPC (must fit with the lore of Xulima).
EARLY BIRD! - STATUE WITH YOUR NAME \r\n============================= \r\nSpecial Early Bird for the "+Statue With your Name" perk, for the first backers who pledge for this awesome reward!

+ STATUE WITH YOUR NAME\r\n============================= \r\nYour name will appear on an in-game statue in the Hall of Heroes in the region of Varaskel.There are 20 unique statues available. Be the first to contribute at this level and you can be the first to choose which statue will be yours. \u25cf All previous rewards up to $120 included.

+ BE AN NPC!\r\n============================= \r\nWe will create an NPC with your name and you\u2019ll get to write the dialog for the NPC. Our artist will even base the portrait of the character on your image. \u25cf The NPC will have your portrait drawn at hand by our artist. \u25cf All previous rewards up to $100 included.
EARLY BIRD! - BE A HERO!\r\n============================= Special Early Bird for the "Be a Hero" perk, for the first backers who pledge for this awesome reward!

+ BE A HERO!\r\n============================= \r\nBe immortalized in Lords of Xulima! Our artist will use your image to draw a beautiful and detailed character portrait for the class you choose (warrior, mage, etc\u2026). The portrait will be available to all who play the game. \u25cf All previous rewards up to $100 included.

+ DESIGN A SPECIAL LOCATION\r\n============================= \r\nWork with the team to design a special location (make it a dungeon, a tower, a cave, a tomb...). Place the enemies, write in riddles, design puzzles, hide traps, include secret rooms\u2026 it\u2019s all up to you! \u25cf All previous rewards up to $120 included.

+ VISIT NUMANTIAN GAMES!
============================= 
Full weekend in Madrid visiting us! (For two people)
Come to Madrid to visit Numantian Games studios. We’ll prepare a special weekend to show you this beautiful city! ● At this level we will also include a special thanks to you in the credits as “Great Sponsor of Lords of Xulima!".
 ● Be a Hero Reward included! ● All previous rewards up to $120 included.
